conversation.content: I'm looking for comfortable, lightweight active shirts that are soft, quick-drying, and durable. My expected price range is between $17.99 and $42.97.

Here are some items that you might like: 
1. 
            Product Name: <X RAY Men's Stretch Soft Cotton Slim Fit Short Sleeve Crewneck T-Shirt, Fashion Casual Tee for Men> 
            Item ID: B0C3WM79M5
            [Price]: $16.99
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'T-Shirts']
            Description:
            Crafted from high quality breathable cotton shirts for men blend, this must-have solid color crewneck t shirts for men offers a perfect casual classic style with ultimate comfort. Great for everyday wear - indoor or outdoor activities, workout at gym, lounging at home, strolling in summer. Can be worn alone or layering up for some extra style. Lightweight, classic slim fit, stretch cotton fabric ensures no pulling when a bit tight. Reinforced double stitched sleeve and hem for extra duribility. Fabric will stay strong even after many washes. Available many sizes and colors to choose from. PLEASE NOTE : This is stretch slim fit T-shirt. For your comfort & regular fit look, we recommend buying a size up.
            
2. 
            Product Name: <Russell Athletic Women's Cotton Performance T-Shirts> 
            Item ID: B08BPYBF7C
            [Price]: $8.94
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Shirts & Tees']
            Description:
            The Russell Athletic¬Æ Women‚Äôs Essential Tee delivers the comfort style and performance to fit your active lifestyle This feminine fit short sleeve T-shirt will keep you dry as you sweat featuring moisture-wicking fabric odor protection UPF 30+ protection and soft spun yarn making this T-shirt extra comfortable It offers the comfort of cotton combined with the benefits of performance 4 75 ounce 60% cotton/40% polyester Oxford Oxford 47% cotton/53% polyester Dri-Power¬Æ Moisture Wicking Technology Odor protection Ladies' fit Crew neck Tagless label RUSSELL ATHLETIC heat sealed label on bottom left front UPF 30+ provides protection from the sun Set-in sleeves
            
3. 
            Product Name: <Champion Men's Long Sleeve Crewneck T Shirt, Long Sleeve T Shirt, Long Sleeve Shirts for Men> 
            Item ID: B0BHMSTLRL
            [Price]: $15.0
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Active', 'Active Shirts & Tees']
            Description:
            FEEL-GOOD SPORTY STYLE FOR THE CITY. Whether you're on a run or just running errands, our Champion® Long-Sleeve Men’s Tee delivers high-impact comfort with ultra-soft polyester-spandex fabric. Moisture-wicking and odor control help you stay focused for literally whatever the day may bring. This casual men’s long sleeve tee shirt features an easy, standard fit, along with raglan sleeves and stretch fabric to ensure you can move freely for workouts or lazy days at home. The "ready to take on the city" look of this casual men's shirt will easily amp up your sport style and makes it perfect for pairing with your favorite jeans or sweats—so you already know this super comfortable men’s long sleeve tee shirt is going to become the next staple of your everyday closet.

The recommended items do not fully align with my Target Needs for comfortable, lightweight active shirts that are soft, quick-drying, and durable. 

Please provide alternative recommendations that fit my criteria.
